channel.title: [FM] Random Rolemadness Madness v2.0 - Game ended! Mafia and Survivor wins!
channel.description:
# [color=randomic]Random Rolemadness Madness[/color] :carousel_horse: _Co-hosted by @BlueStorm_ **Welcome to the Random Rolemadness Madness!** This setup follows standard mafia rules, but all roles are randomly selected [of this list](https://www.mafiauniverse.com/forums/database/mafia-roles/). Because, you know, being the Alpha Townie is a dream.
The setup is infinite by nature, following the rule of `town = scum*3.5` Any players in "excess" will be neutrals (ie, 20er will be a 4/14/2) I will roll exclusively [third party](https://www.mafiauniverse.com/forums/database/mafia-roles/?roletype=Third%20Party) roles for neutrals. Third party roles can't be rolled by neither mafia nor town.
### [color=randomic]Gameplay[/color] Balance is not guaranteed. Cycles are 48/24, or shorter if someone is lynched We are going to do majority + plurality. There are no logs, but there can be death notes. Private chats of a kind will be done in PMs. When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it Feedback is limited, only investigative roles will be aware of occupations or redirections I will add modifiers to a role if it is recommended by its description (normally being 3-shot or 1-shot). Any role can be from any alignment.
### [color=randomic]To Join[/color] To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### [color=randomic]Rolecards[/color]
[details="Town"] > ## [color=green]Town Bodyguard[/color] > You are the Bodyguard, aligned with the Town! You have the following ability. > _The Bodyguard may each night target a player and protect them from death by dying in their stead if they're targeted for death._ > **Goal: Defeat the Mafia and all neutrals who seek to do you harm** [/details]
[details="Mafia"] > ## [color=red]Mafia Bodyguard[/color] > You are the Bodyguard, aligned with the Mafia! You have the following ability. > _The Bodyguard may each night target a player and protect them from death by dying in their stead if they're targeted for death._ > **Goal: Defeat the Town and all neutrals who seek to do you harm** [/details]
[details="Neutral"] > ## [color=gray]Zombie[/color] > You are the Zombie, all by yourself. You have the following ability. > _The Zombie infects a player each night and wins if the number of infected players ever outnumber the number of healthy players._ > **Goal: The number of infected players ever outnumber the number of healthy players.** [/details]
### [color=randomic]Players[/color] 1. ~~Solic~~ 2. ~~Meteoro~~ 3. Gamerpoke 4. ~~Isaac~~ 7. PoisonedSquid 8. ~~WazzaAzza~~ 9. ~~Geyde~~ 10. ~~Soulshade55r~~ 11. Maxwell 11. Magnus 12. Margaret 13. ~~SweetyCake~~ 15. ~~Sam17z~~ 16. H_Hjasik 15. ~~MaximusPrime~~
#### [color=randomic]Backups[/color] 1.
#### [color=randomic]Spectators[/color] 1. Firekitten 2. Astand
### [color=randomic]Milestones:[/color] [Sunflower rebellion restarts](https://www.burpee.com/dw/image/v2/ABAQ_PRD/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-masterCatalog_Burpee/default/dwb4e4fce0/Images/Product%20Images/prod500459/prod500459.jpg?sw=320&sh=378&sm=fit)
